amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to resolve claims against funds contained in the Iraqi Claims Fund made by U.S. citizens against the Government of Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 36, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to authorize the Foreign Claims Settlement Commission to determine the validity and amounts of any claims by nationals of the United States against the Government of Iraq.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Doggett amendment (A019) Agreed to by recorded vote: 427 - 0 (Roll no. 328).
